hero_subtitle: I build things for the web.
hero_subtitle_two: I’m a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I’m focused on building accessible.
about_description: Hello! My name is Taha and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2017 when I decided to try editing custom Tumblr themes — it turns out that experimenting and playing with Tumblr themes taught me a lot about HTML and CSS!
about_description_two: Fast-forward to today, and I’ve had the privilege of working at an advertising agency , a start-up , a huge corporation , and a student-led design studio . My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences at
about_skills_title: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

details: Deliver high-quality, robust production code for a diverse array of projects
Work alongside creative directors to lead the research, development, and architecture of technical solutions to fulfill business requirements
Collaborate with designers, project managers, and other engineers to transform creative concepts into production realities for clients and stakeholders
Provide leadership within engineering department through close collaboration, knowledge shares, and mentorship
I used to train at Raya Academy, which is a specialized educational center
Training covered the following fields: Programming, Networking, and Information Security
I also trained over 200 male and female students at the Canadian College during their summer training program at the college

project_desc_portfolio: Personal website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring responsive design and theme toggle, some beautiful animations were added using Framer Motion
project_desc_lms: An integrated and powerful e-learning platform built using Odoo ERP. We offer a seamless and effective learning experience that includes course management, student progress tracking, and interactive communication, in addition to comprehensive management of educational operations thanks to its integration with Odoo.
project_desc_ui_library: Reusable components built with Next & Tailwind, used across internal tools and apps.
project_desc_ui_React: Reusable components built with React & Tailwind, used across internal tools and apps.
whats_desc: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll try my best to get back to you!
whats_app: Click here to chat on WhatsApp, and I'll reply immediately
contact_description: Have a question, idea, or opportunity? Let’s connect! Fill out the form below and I’ll get back to you soon.
